00023 
00024         function max_downloads($buffer, $item)
00025         {
00026                 return $item->downloads > $buffer ? $item->downloads : $buffer;
00027         }
00028         
00029         function sum_downloads($buffer, $item)
00030         {
00031                 $buffer += $item->downloads;
00032                 return $buffer;
00033         }
00034         
00035         if (count($this->softwares) > 0)
00036         {
00037                 foreach ($this->softwares as $software)
00038                 {
00039                         $software->has_many('software_artifacts');
00040                         $software->downloads = array_reduce($software->software_artifacts, 'sum_downloads', 0);
00041                 }
00042                 
00043                 $max_downloads = array_reduce($this->softwares, 'max_downloads', 0);
00044                 
00045                 $row = 0;
00046                 foreach ($this->softwares as $software)
00047                 {
00048 ?>
00049                 <div style="text-align:right;float:left;width:200px">
00050                         <?php print $software->title; ?><br />
00051                         <?php printf(l('%s downloads'), $software->downloads); ?>
00052                 </div>
00053                 <div class="download-bar"
00054                         style="width:<?php echo floor(450 * $software->downloads / $max_downloads); ?>px">
00055                         <a style="display:block"
00056                                 href="<?php echo $this->url_to(array('action' => 'software_downloads_by_release', 'id' => $software->id)); ?>">
00057                                 &nbsp;

00059                 </div>
00060 <?php
